description:
11.23 cas
Apply Contrast Adaptive Sharpen filter to video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

planes.description: Set planes to filter. Default value is to filter all planes except alpha plane.

strength.description: Set the sharpening strength. Default value is 0.

name: cas

parameters.description: Set the sharpening strength. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: strength

parameters.description: Set planes to filter. Default value is to filter all planes except alpha plane.
parameters.name: planes

source:
11.23 cas

Apply Contrast Adaptive Sharpen filter to video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

strength

Set the sharpening strength. Default value is 0.

planes

Set planes to filter. Default value is to filter all planes except alpha plane.
